summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CareerIQ v3.1 - All backend APIs and frontend flows working correctly. Simplified single-page order flow verified.
passed_tests: Health endpoint returns version 3.1
Root endpoint returns version 3.1
/api/upload - Accepts resume (required), target_role, mobile_number (v3.1 simplified flow)
/api/upload - Accepts resume with optional LinkedIn upload
/api/upload - Correctly rejects upload without resume (422)
/api/upload - Correctly rejects upload without target_role (422)
/api/upload - Correctly rejects upload without mobile_number (422)
/api/create-order - Creates order for ₹499 tier using session_id (NOT lead_id)
/api/create-order - Creates order for ₹2999 tier with correct amount (299900 paise)
/api/create-order - Creates order for ₹4999 tier with correct amount (499900 paise)
/api/create-order - Correctly rejects invalid tier value (400)
/api/create-order - Correctly rejects invalid session_id (404)
/api/verify-payment - Correctly rejects incomplete payment verification (422)
/api/verify-payment - Correctly requires session_id in payload
/api/analyze - Correctly requires payment before analysis (402)
/api/analyze - Correctly rejects invalid session_id (404)
/api/report - Returns 404 for non-existent session
/api/report - Returns session status for existing session
/api/razorpay-key - Returns valid Razorpay test key
/api/session - Returns session status with target_role
Complete v3.1 simplified flow: upload -> create-order works end-to-end
Flow with LinkedIn: linkedin_provided flag correctly set
Old /api/capture-lead endpoint correctly removed (returns 404)
Frontend: Landing page loads correctly with all tier options
Frontend: Order page has simplified single-page flow (NO lead capture step)
Frontend: Resume upload (required) with asterisk indicator
Frontend: LinkedIn PDF marked as (Optional — Recommended)
Frontend: Target Role input with data-testid
Frontend: Mobile Number input with +91 prefix and data-testid
Frontend: WhatsApp helper text for mobile number
Frontend: Order summary shows tier-specific features
Frontend: Proceed to Pay button with data-testid
Frontend: All three tiers (₹499, ₹2999, ₹4999) order pages work
Frontend: Processing page shows tier-specific header (Interpretation Analysis for ₹499)
Frontend: Processing page has analytical stages (NOT motivational quotes)
Frontend: Processing page shows analytical quotes like 'Evaluating market interpretation signals'
Frontend: Mobile responsive design works correctly
critical_code_review_comments: v3.1 implementation is complete with simplified single-page order flow
Lead capture step correctly removed - name and current_role extracted from resume during LLM analysis
Mobile number with WhatsApp helper text implemented correctly
Processing page has tier-specific analytical stages (not motivational quotes)
All data-testid attributes present for testing
Backend correctly validates required fields (resume, target_role, mobile_number)
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix during pytest runs
context_for_next_testing_agent: CareerIQ v3.1 is fully functional. The simplified single-page order flow (Upload -> Payment) is working. Lead capture step removed - name and current_role are extracted from resume during LLM analysis. Mobile number with WhatsApp helper text implemented. Processing page has tier-specific analytical stages. All three tiers (₹499, ₹2999, ₹4999) are working. Backend test file at /app/tests/test_careeriq_v31.py can be reused for regression testing. Test session 554baee6-6655-47cf-bbba-4252a87c4252 exists with status 'uploaded'.
